!Blacksmith Silvery: Oh, fine, fine! I see that you are ready for the Artisan test. It is administered by the guild master of the Black Anvil, of whom you have certainly heard - a blacksmith of great renown! I will give the first, most basic of the tests; if you pass, you may go on to the second test. Shall we begin? [Quest _418_PathToArtisan blacksmith_silvery_q0418_06.htm|Take the first part of the test.]
